Pros: Great Zoom; Good in Low Light; Good Image Stabilization
Best camera I've seen for its size and zoom. Really recommend it. I've bought two of them so far. Been an Olympus fan all my life (still am) but this camera was the best at this time for its zoom and compactness. Optics is the primary qualification for my camera purchases, which narrows down to Olympus, Nikon and Cannon. Period.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Easy to use and great quality pictures
Item.Review:
Pros: Overall ease of use, crystal clear 720 video, picture quality and the optical zoom are great.
Cons: The location of the flash and the fact that it does not retract when you turn the camera off.
I purchased the S8000 to replace my Canon SX200 which took too long to recycle between shots and did not provide quality pictures. I've had the S8000 for about four months and have used it extensively with absolutely fantastic results. The battery life is amazing, the 10X optical zoom is really useful and the camera also takes great action pictures. The in-camera capability to crop pictures is not only a great feature, but is also easy to use. Overall it's an excellent camera.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Pros: Good Image Stabilization, Great Zoom, Short Lag Time ... Cons: Poor software for Win 7 Very easy to use and incredibly sharp pictures. Awesome camera for the price. The software has been a headache ever since I upgraded to Windows 7. Overall I would highly recommend this camera for the casual photographer.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Nikon makes a great camera easy to use!
Item.Review:
Pros: Excellent product easy to use!
Cons: battery charge system
I buy a new Nikon Coolpix every two - three years and give them as gifts to family members. The Nikon S-8000 is powerful, versitale an provides quality digital images in any light. This camera has many options and is user friendly. Excellent camera for the price.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Pros: Compact, Good Image Stabilization, Good in Low Light, Great Zoom ... Cons: Lens noise in videos, Poor Flash location I returned one S8000 to exchange it for another because of a clicking sound during video playback. The second S8000 had the same problem. When zooming in or out, the lenses noises are recorded on the video clips. This was a known problem because Nikon included a statement in the user's manual about it. It is a great camera if that is all you will use it for but others cost less and have similar features.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Short Lag Time; Good in Low Light; Great Zoom; Nice Body Color; Good Image Stabilization
I traveled out of the country and it was easy carry. Took great photos

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: huge range of features
Cons: limited video formats
Excellent camera, I have a Canon Coolpix with similar options and a little less Pix and zoom. This was for the wife, she needs to take video and out digital video recorder does not have the quality and does not capture the light correctly. My camera (Canon) has poor audio so we tried the Nikon. All worked great but the files are too big to e-mail. Need a 24 fpm instead of 30. Great camera, but didn't work for what we need. I would recommend it highly, have had Nikons in the past and they are great, still use the software for ahte camera. I will be getting a D5000 SLR soon, but this would be a great everyday with full manul and varies stages of manual use available.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: user friendly
Cons: you just have to be very careful with it
I bought this camera for a certain trip, and it was great! The zoom was nice, and pictures were HD quality. I would recommend this camera. The LCD screen was so clear, compared to other cameras that I used in the past. This was probably one of the best (point and shoot) cameras I could get for the price, since DSLRs are a little over my budget right now.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: OK photos, but quality overall is low
Item.Review:
Pros: Lots of choices
Cons: Battery dead in a month, long charge time, flash badly located...
I've been using Sony pocket cameras forever but thought I'd give NIkon a try since I have a D60. Man, am I sorry I did. The battery life on this is so poor, it would be drained in less than an hour of start/stop shooting. Now it's been less than a month and the battery will not hold a charge at all.
The only way to charge it is mini-USB, and the flimsy rubber cover to the port has already broken off, after days of not clicking into place and getting caught on anything.
Picture quality is OK, but not as good as the Sony with a Carl Zeiss lens. I'm going back to Sony, right after this camera goes back to the store.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: I would buy this product again and again
Item.Review:
Pros: Nice Body Color; Good in Low Light; Good Image Stabilization; Great Zoom
Cons: Poor Image Stabilization
I am a nikon lover for life. I used to own a nikon d80 and nothing can compare to it. However over the years my professional use has slimed and i prefer to carry a smaller nikon for everyday easy use. this camera is great. i really love it and would recomend it to anyone. I would love to see some other colors thought, aside from the black red and gold body they offer.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Nice Body Color; Great Zoom; Good Image Stabilization; Short Lag Time
I bought this for my wife who is not very technology savvy. She found this camera to be extremely easy to use. She loves the high level of zoom and speed of response of the camera. I warned her about the flash being in a bad spot, and she said that has not been a problem at all.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Love this Camera!! Great for every day use!
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use, Great Pics, Fast Battery charing, Good price
Cons: Some of the internal Lightening Features.
I love this camera. It's really easy to use. Great value for the price. It's much better than many cameras out there!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Nice Body Color; Good Image Stabilization; Great Zoom; Good in Low Light; Short Lag Time
Seems like a great camera thus far. Lag time is suprisingly short, and low-light pics are of good quality. Zoom is fantastic.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: We wanted a new, light, portable camera that took photos fast. The reviews said this was a good one and it was in our budget due to a discount. Loads of features, very easy to use. Only problem (which other reviews agree) flash position is annoying as it's where your left index finger naturally rests. You get used to that. Other than that the camera is fabulous and the video function not bad either.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: This is a lovely camera. Takes very good quality pictures. Focus is excellent. For taking pictures at a distant this camera is great. Detail is brilliant. Would recommend it to anyone who enjoys taking pictures and wants a small camera. Excellent.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Advanced DSLR for advanced users, may be second camera for professionals. I do not recommend this camera as first (d5100 will be better). I used Nikon 300s at work and bought d7000 for home - this two cameras are good and d7000 wins in noises, dynamic range, in video, but loose in exposure metering (sometimes) and continuous shooting. Long lasting battery - nearly 1300 shoots. Good ergonomic. Strong magnium case.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Fantastic Camera for the price. I love the 10X optical zoom.
Cons: Battery life is a little short. You get about 200 - 210 shots.
This camera is an excellent camera for it's price. There are a lot of features that help you take the picture that you want. The 10X optical zoom lets you really get the good shots from a decent distance. There is also a feature that allows you to take extremely close shots...less than an inch away.
The battery life is a little short. It only allows for about 200 - 210 shots from a full charge and since it is a Ni-Cad flat battery pack, you can't just put some AA batteries in for replacement. I would LOVE to see the option to purchase an additional battery pack or two with possibly a charger to just plug the batteries into.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Being a Nikon I did have great expectations and no disappointments surfaced with this camera. I routinely use a Nikon D300 and bought the S8000 as a small portable travel camera for my briefcase. Just came back from Hoover Dam and took duplicate photo's with both cameras. Conditions were harsh (lightings conditions) and varied (dark tunnels with overhead lights and reflections galore). It was difficult when looking at the photo's to tell which camera took which picture. Clear sharp images with great color balance. Controls are easy to use and zoom quality was very good.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to use, Picture quality, zoom
Cons: Nothing!
Working for Best Buy I have a lot of customer's ask me which camera that I would call my 'go to' camera. I can honestly say that I can talk about this camera for hours if need be.
The picture quality is amazing. With the 14 Megapixles i've printed pictures as large as 20"x30" with no noticable pixilation or distortion of the image! The colors are always true to the subject in the picture and can be altered on the camera itself.
The zoom is outstanding for a camera this size and price! In the past the highest the zoom has been was a 5x or even a 7x but 10x optical zoom is leaps and bounds better than a majority of the other point and shoots on the market right now!
If your looking for a camera for pic ... tures instead of 'looks' the Nikon Coolpix S8000 is your camera!
If you have any other questions you can always go to your local Best Buy and ask an assosiate for help, we would be more than happy to help you out! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Excellent small camera with HD video
Item.Review:
Pros: Optics and zoom are excellent...once camera is "booted" very fast response
Cons: Two stage start up is slower than expected
I wanted to replace my Nikon S630 camera when the S8000 become available. The camera features are similar to the S630 so the learning curve was minimal. The 10x optical zoom is excellent for a camera this small. The ability to shoot HD video on this camera with a one button push is a real plus. The pop-up flash can interfere with how you would typically hold a camera of this size, but retraining myself to hold it differently has not been a major problem.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: The features, picture quality make this camera one of the best.
Cons: The access door for the USB connection. The door already pulled away from the retainer.
I've been using a D200 Nikon for years, love it and still use it when I'm taking serious pictures, and need multiple lenses. However, this camera has become my everyday camera, and it's darn near perfect.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: excellent camera for a great price!!!!
Item.Review:
Pros: The zoom, large LCD screen, the quality of the pics
Cons: none so far
I am not sure what they guy below me is thinking, but this camera is awesome. It takes excellent pics. Better than my previous canon rebel. The 10x optical zoom is very nice to have. Battery life is really good as well. Also, the 720p HD movies you can take, are really good looking. I have yet to find something wrong with this camera. Best bang for your buck if you ask me.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Fantastic camera, large screen on back - big bonus, easy to use and hold (although you need to remember to keep finger away from pop up flash). Easy to navigate controls once you get familiarised. Lovely clear pictures. Certainly recommend to others.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Recently gave this camera to my father as a gift and it is amazing!! The zoom is awesome and the resolution is sooo clear!!! It's a perfect gift for the shooter who wants a small camera body to carry around with a powerful zoom !!! Way to go Nikon!! The downside is the flash...it can pop up and hit your left hand while holding the camera but it just takes some getting used to...

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Good looking, clear instructions making getting to know this camera in easy steps no hardship. Then whow! how good was the results10 out of 10, clean crisp pictures, telephoto operation is smooth - battery life excellent. I have had other compacts but this one wins hands down

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Looked for a point and shoot camera with fast sutter speed. This camera worked out nicely on a family vacation to Disney. Stills turned out nice using the auto settings. Video worked well even in low lighting conditions. This camera did not have the noise issue in video mode.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: This is my 2nd... Yes, I said 2nd Nikon Coolpix s8000. The 1st one would not save the pictures to the formatted card and it would take over 20+ seconds to record a single picture. After sending it back twice for the same problem the manufacturer sent me a new one... with the same problem!! If you want to take consecutive pictures (even 10-15 seconds between pictures) don't buy this camera! I've lost tons of 1st moments with my kids because of this camera. I've had to start taking the battery out to get the zoom to close AND to get the camera to turn off!... Don't waste your money!!!!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: As good as I would expect from Nikon. I prefer a viewfinder, but the size of the screen makes framing a picture easy. Small confusion when viewing pictures, but this will come with practice. The user manual on a disc. A shortened version on paper would be useful

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Produces great quality pictures & very easy to use. Good optical zoom means no reduction in quality for zoomed shots. Good value for money. Battery lasts a good while once charged & doesnt take too long to charge either.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: The best compact camera I have ever had, the pictue quality is Top Draw and the video is so clear especially when played back in the computer. Like people before me I find the only drawback is the Pop up Flash, if only this was built in I would give it 5 Stars but held back because of that. However over all it is a 5 star camera as far as picture quality is concerned. Highly recommend it.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Great all-round product. The benefits are: (1) Good build quality; (2) The picture quality offers good options; (3) The flash is very powerful. The main disadvantage is the pop-up flash.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Brilliant value for money, excellent picture qaulity, good looking camera, good sized screen. Easy to use the basics the tech bits will take a little time. My partner is a Photographer and recommended this one for me to buy as a compact camera, even he was impressed. Love it!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Review: Nikon S8000 Black Digital Camera
Item.Review: Good Points: Compact, easy to carry - important if you engage in outdoor activites such as walking or mountain biking. Excellent picture quality for the size of the camera. Works reasonably well in lower light situations. I'm still learning how to use it to get the best out of the camera in various conditions. There are lots of scene modes, and sometimes in real situations it is not always clear which one will be best. Bad Points: No really bad points, but you may need to change your usual method of holding the camera to avoid the pop up flash. Once you get used to this there is no problem.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Bought this as a Xmas present for a friend, who is a keen photograoher. Absolutely fantastic piece of equipment. Excellent picture quality and lovely large screen. Delighted with this camera. Highly recommended for the price range.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: I'd do it all over again!
Item.Review: This camera is easy to use, has a setting for nearly any situation and yields great pictures. It has a rechargeable battery that doesn't allow you to simply replace batteries if it runs out. It is quick at allowing you to see shots you've taken.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Takes very clear crisp pictures - many options - price
Cons: Location of flash - no black/white option - night/low light picture taking
I wanted to downsize my camera and chose the Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2-Megapixel Digital Camera. I have taken near a thousand pics and have been very happy with it. It is light, thin, and small so it is easy to carry around all day. The pics are very clear and people have been impressed with them. It has many nice features, giving the operator options for their picture taking. A few things we haven't liked: The flash. It pops up from the top corner and most times your finger will be in the way. You do get used to holding the camera different - from the sides rather than a finger on the top. It doesn't have the option of taking black & ... amp; white photos and sepia. Not a big deal though since a person can choose to edit at snapfish or other photo processor. I also have had trouble with night time picture taking. I'm not sure if it the camera or the operator. I'll have to play more with it. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I use my new camera just for fun snapshots here and there, I am no professional. Although I am beginning to really enjoy photography, and my new camera makes it easy. I like how when you turn it on it is ready to go and does not take forever to load, it's in those moments when you turn your camera on that you could miss an awesome shot. I also like the sleek, black design because it can fit in your pocket easily. The only thing I don't particularly like is where the flash is. Other than that I would highly recommend this camera to anyone.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Pros: Easy To Use, Fast/accurate auto-focus, Good Image Quality, Good Image Stabilization, Good in Low Light, Great Zoom, Large Clear LCD, Short Lag Time I have a problem of trembling. With our previous cameras no one would let me take pictures because they were always out of focus. Since purchasing the S8000 I have a new confidence and I do all the picture taking again. I still tremble but the pictures are great, even viewed with the large formats. In the past 3 months we have returned off from 2 vacation areas. I display my photos on our 47" LCD TV with much success to family and neighbors.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: user friendly
Cons: haven't found no problems, yet!
easy to use menu, helps to set up camera the way you want it! awesome sitll shots! video is really really clear. Nikon is a great brand!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: The first refurbished one gave me a constantly shaking viewfinder,[...] The second one works well and is performing as I hoped. I carry it with me everywhere because it's too much trouble to carry my D300 everywhere. Now I can shoot for fun not just commercial or competition photography. The macro works surprising well. The scene selection is a bit of release from managing a DSLR for various shooting situations. It isn't quite as good as the DSLR's but it sure gets photos that I can't get when the DSLR's are at home.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Pros: Anti shake feature, Good Image Quality, Good Image Stabilization, Good in Low Light, Great Zoom, Large Clear LCD ... Cons: Complicated I find all the features useful, but often have trouble locating them. I've printed some excellent gallery quality photos from this camera. Nice size and feel.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Great pictures,super zoom,fast response for a point and shoot. Very easy to use. I use my SLR much less now. This camera fits in your pocket and takes very good pictures. Easy to travel with. I guess the latest version (S8100) is better but this one is great.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Lens
Cons: Pop up Flash
This is the best camera i've ever had, other comercial brands like sony and panasonic are way behind nikon. Great zoom, awesome display and great contrast.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: It's a good camera for the price
Item.Review:
Pros: Good price
Cons: Transfer of photos to pc is not easiest process.
I compared prices of several models and this model seemed to be the best value. It has some nice features.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: High-quality camera with just a few little quirks.
Item.Review:
Pros: Picture quality, solidly constructed, easy to use.
Cons: Flash placement, location of charging plug.
We really like this camera. The shutter speed is fast, it recharges quickly and holds its charge, and the photo quality is great. As other reviews have pointed out, the only oddity with this camera is the placement of the flash. It pops up right where your finger holds the camera. While annoying, you get used to it so I wouldn't let it dissuade you from purchasing the camera. The plug for the charger is also oddly inaccessible, but (again) not a deal-breaker for us.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Review: Nikon S8000 Digital Camera - Champagne Silver
Item.Review:
Good Points: This is very easy to use. The optical zoom is ace, very clear images when on full zoom.
This pics up every detail - rain droplets, hairs etc!
The camer is very lightweight and small considering the size of the lense Bad Points: Holding it akes some getting used to - where the flash pops up, this is where you would normally/naturally place your hand to keep the camera steady, but due to the flash popping up it stops you from holding it the way you would naturally.
It doesnt come with any extras - had to buy a case and memory card.
the internal memory isnt very big

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: good photographs; good price; 10X makes it special.
Cons: slow exposure.
I purchased this camera for private use. I am not afflicated with Nixon, Nixon production, distribution or sales. It is an excellent camera to have with me most ot the time. The photographs are outstanding. Yes, you can learn to keep your finger out of the way of the flash. What do you want for $250 bucks? If you want a 35mm with all the whistle and bells, buy one.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I carry this compact digital camera on bike rides to shoot landscapes and off-beat scenes and objects I find in parts of my hometown that most people never get around to seeing. This camera is lightweight, small and fits in my hand nicely. It takes great pictures and the Scene modes are terrific. The downsides are, the flash is in an awkward location for holding the camera (upper left corner, and it pops up right where my index finger grabs hold) and the various Scene modes are in a sub-menu that you have to search for. But these are both pretty minor complaints compared to the quality of the camera.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I have been using this camera to record my inspection of infrastructure at an Ivy league campus. It is compct but offers a boatload of features. Has very sharpe resoultion. Long battery life between charges. Powerful flash. Solid metal body construction. I would recommend the Coolpix S8000 to anyone.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Large Clear LCD; Great Zoom; Good Image Stabilization; Small / Compact; Easy To Use; Nice Body Color
Cons: No Viewfinder; Short Battery Life; Poor Flash; Lag / Shutter Delay
Casual photographer, family photos, scenery, etc. Most photos turned out very good, some with blue tints. Do not use dawn/dusk mode unless you want blue photos, Do not use Party unless you want orange tinted photos. Sunset mode is cool gives photos a golden glow and enhances the blue in the sky. Camera often delays between taking photos and is slow while saving the image to the camera to view it. Battery indicator only shows up when battery is half used and remains showing half used unitl it just dies with no further indication. Battery is good for one day only before recharging. Charger plugs into ... the camera and I prefer one that is external. Other than these items the camera took some great outside and zoom photos with no blur on action shots. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Short Lag Time; Good Image Stabilization; Good Image Quality; Small / Compact; Large Clear LCD; Easy To Use; Nice Body Color; Great Zoom; Good in Low Light
The camera is never far from my reach. I am constantly alert for photo ops and like to try artistic shots - closeups and zooms. I particularly like the ease of selecting exposure settings.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Nikon Coolpix S8000: Nice little digicam
Item.Review: Plan to use this as a take-everywhere camera for family shots and vacation pics, when I don't want to carry my Nikon DSLR. Quality of photos is very good - after adjusting a few out-of-the-box settings. Auto mode works for very well for most situations. Menus are easy to use, with quick acess to frequently used functions and settings. The camera is a little bit bigger than most digital point & shoots, which could be a drawback for some users. Battery life is very short; on a recent trip it lasted just a day and had to be charged each night. And the battery can only be charged in the camera - it would be nice to have an external charger for a second battery. Location of pop-up flash is not a big issue - the camera tells you if you're holding it down - but you may need to adjust the ... way you hold the camera. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: I've got mixed feelings for this item
Item.Review: [...] I recived it and proceeded to use all its functions which went well till about the 50th picture. That is when the camera lens cover malfunctioned and stuck halfway open, and wouldn't move. I had to send it in for repair, AFTER ONLY 50 PICTURES! That SUCKS! The few pictures I was able to take seemed fine in every respect, the camera was relatively simple to use, I was happy with it till it prematurely malfuntioned.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: video
Cons: general picture taking
I'm a professional photographer that git this camera to take real quick shots of my daughter when my dslr is away... sometimes got clear shots and other times the camera wouldn't forcus. the video seemed to be great but I returned it for a canon sx210is. GO GET ONE.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Picture quality and amazingly accurate/true colors captured!
Cons: Pop up flash in a poor location
Aside from the flash in a poor location, charging the battery in the camera, and the thin little cover on the charging/downloading port, this camera has the features of a professional camera in a convenient point and shoot! After all, I did buy this camera for how it works and what it can do, so the little stuff I'll easily overlook. My first digital camera was a Nikon (3.0 meagapixels...high tech at the time!) and after several years of wear and tear (even though it STILL takes amazing pictures) I decided to buy a new camera and was sold on the flashy looks of a red Samsung, what a mistake! So I'm back to Nikon and won't ever change again! So far I'm really happy and thin ... k it's well worth the investment! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: takes high quality photos, great zoom lense
Cons: large camera body, long shutter time
It's a nice camera, takes great photos, easy to manage. Two issues I have with it, though. This camera was a replacement for the previous Nikon I owned (the 1sti Nikon had a damaged shutter that was unfixable). So now the camera it too large to fit into my camera case. I have to buy a new camera case now. Second issue I have is that the shutter sometimes takes too long to take a photo and by that time the moment has passed.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Quality of the photo's
Cons: The shutter is very delicate. Same as the S6000 that is what happened to it. It got bent.
The Nikon Coolpix S8000 is a very good quality, compact camera. It has all the features that I wanted and more. Anti shake, HD quality video, face recognition, great zoom and much more. This was an upgrade for me from the S6000.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to use
This was purchased for my wife to use while kayaking. She likes it very much.
It is a good camera and easy to use,all the controls are easy to understand and use. It also has a rechargeable battery which is a cost saver.
Good value for anyone,beginner or advanced.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Review: Nikon S8000 14MP Digital Compact Camera - Red.
Item.Review: Good quality photos and lots of handy features. Only negative is as previously mentioned the flash is in a really silly place, just where you naturally hold the camera so if you forget to hold it elsewhere the flash wont go off properly. Otherwise a great camera.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Image Stabilization; Good Image Quality; Large Clear LCD; Nice Body Color; Fast/accurate auto-focus
Cons: Died at 3-months; Menu is hard to use
I didn't want to ever be without a camera, so I got this to carry in a shirt pocket. After three months, the only thing it will do is blink the green circle around the power button. Disappointed in this one. Not up to Nikon standards.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Not bad for price,Good size-easy to carry.
Item.Review:
Pros: The camera has great features for the price and takes decent photos.
Cons: The flash pops up right where you are holding the camera
The thing I did not like and reason for camera return was the flash pops up right where you are holding the camera. If you need the flash you wind up holding the camera with one hand. Not a great way to take steady photos. If the flash was in front I would have kept the camera. I will now take my time when researching for a camera purchase. The camera has great features for the price and takes decent photos.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Telephoto, picture quality, ease of use
Cons: Lack of manual settings
Great camera for the money. Easy to use, very good pictures, powerful telephoto and lots of features. Perfect for those who don't want the bulk or expense of an SLR. The only drawback is the lack of manual settings for the few occasions where they'd come in handy.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Picture Quality
Cons: Price is a bit high, but worth it.
This is by far the best camera I've ever owned. Love that you have a rechargeable battery! The diplay is awesome. I took pictures out my car window as my husband drove 80 mph and the pics look as if we stopped! Love this camera...highly recommend.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I bought this camera since my CoolPix 7600 wasn't cutting it anymore for my needs (pics looked low-quality, flash had TOO MUCH LAG, and low-light pics didn't come out anymore). I'm VERY happy that this model is much improved over the 7600! My most important pics are taken on family camping trips (hiking, boating, sightseeing, or just around the campsite) in different lighting situations (daytime, forest, nighttime), and this camera takes excellent pics! I've played around with different scene modes and many of them work very well. when I use museum mode (NO flash--some museums have this rule), pics come out much better than with my previous camera. I don't consider battery life a crisis--when it's low and I'm on the go, I can charge it through a computer or through my car (with a U ... SB-to-car-power-outlet thingy). my biggest gripe is with the flash placement on the top left--I've taken pics and realized that my finger was ON the flash, preventing it from popping up! I have petite fingers and it's tough to know where to hold the camera with your left hand. also, the outside front left of the camera is too smooth, so my fingers have sometimes slipped when holding the camera (GOOD THING I always use the wrist strap)! I actually bought a Zagg Design clear protective skin for my camera, so that helped with holding the camera. Overall, I'm VERY happy that I own this camera! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Maybe I got a defective camera but the camera lens started to stick and then refused to open or close after only 3 weeks of use. We were not happy with the quality of pictures either. They often turned out blurry and the colors were not bright like they should be. We returned it and got a Canon.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Clear, fast pictures with awesome flash.
Cons: Placement/style of flash.
This camera is great. The picture is super clear and the speed is quick! I was able to go on rides at the park without it blurring ONCE. Another great feature that I was looking for was the flash. This one is BRIGHT. It works great at night or in dark areas like restaurants. It's almost like you're taking a picture in broad daylight. The only drawback I could see was where the flash was positioned. Instead of it being a lens on the front it's one of those old pop-up styled flashes. This means you have to be very careful not to bump it anywhere near the top corner. I dropped mine by accident and the dent ended up jamming the flash so it wouldn't pop up. But Best Buy treated me well and I got a ... new camera. I would definitely recommend this camera! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: The perfect high end compact camera!
Item.Review: I purchased this item half price, what a deal it turned out to be! The photo quality is excellent and the extended optical zoom works great. This camera is incredibly easy to use, literally just 'point & shoot' and other options such as changing the settings, smile/blink detection, macro photos and panoramic mode are all incredibly easy to do. You can also edit your photos on the camera which isn't always possible on other similar cameras. Highly Recommended!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: When I ordered this camera, it wasn't long thereafter it was sold out @ B&H. Upon my useage, the camera surpasses my expectations. It can pretty much do as much (if not more)than my Nikon D300 can do. It's MACRO/Flower capacity is outstanding. The quality is as good as using my Marco 105 lens on the big D300....this camera is well worth its price.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: As a photographic enthusiast,I have been looking for a digital camera that will fit the bill in terms of its unique features and picture quality. This quality purchase from Argos does not only fit my bill in terms of the picture quality it produces time and time again. It absolutely does the job perfectly.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I've been using this camera for lots of candid shots of my kids. Pictures are nice and camera seems easy to use. Location of flash is definitely problematic, but I seem to be getting into the habit of not keeping my finger there. I went with the black for the bargain price but another color would probably have a nicer look. I just pretend the black is a retro look.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Image Stabilization; Great Zoom; Short Lag Time
This camera is very easy to get quality photos from. It is very easy to use and the instructions/menu are easy to navigate. I am very happy with this Nikon.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Good Camera ,,But some features not good
Item.Review: Picture quality is good. Pop up Flash on the top is not a good feature Charger facility is not good The AV out put has a thin cover which is not robust Not user friendly

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Review: Nikon S8000 Digital Camera - Champagne Silver
Item.Review: Good Points: Fantastic camera all round. Good enough for the experienced photographer who doesn't want to carry larger SLR type cameras, and for the novice, there's enough features to get impressive photo's with little photography knowledge. The S8000's Panorama feature and the supplied Panorama Maker software is great to use. And with sharp images from the Macro mode, there's so much fun to be had for the novice. Bad Points: None I've found so far.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Amazing picture quality
Cons: difficult to learn
I bought this camera to replace a Sony Cybershot that had started acting up on us. After two weeks, My wife said she HATED the camera and told me to return it. Luckily, I didn't have time to return it right away because she figured out how to use the camera. This camera takes the most amazing pictures I have ever seen with a Point and Shoot camera! The picture clarity is SO far above the Sony camera we were using! We love this camera now and everyone who has played with it has agreed that the picture quality is truly amazing. It is somewhat complicated at first in comparison to other Point and Shoot cameras but the quality of picture you will soon learn how to take will change your mind. The biggest thing to learn for us ... is that the camera will tell you when it is going to take a good/ or bad picture. If it flashes GREEN and beeps, it will come out good. If it flashes red, NO GOOD and it means it! Absolutely love it! Want a camera that takes quality pictures without the bulk of a DSLR? Buy this camera!!!!!!!!
I wish I could've posted better pictures from this camera but we are limited to 5MB and the good ones are above that..... expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Can carry in my purse or pocket and still get excellent digital pics
Cons: Still so new, haven't found a problem.
Ive been taking pics for years, primarily for work newsletters, rental properties, etc. The size of the camera was daunting; requiring a carrying case, and bulky. The coolpix is being used mainly for art classes (painting after retirement) where I can easily take a pic of the item(s) being painted and finish my work at home. The pictures are clear, detailed, and reproduce with true color values. All in my pocket! Love it.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to set up, great price, fantastic pictures, quick & easy
Cons: Flash is in an awkward place
This camera is great! I got it specifically to take pictures of my son! He is always making new memories and new first moments that I wantt o capture and treasure! This camera is quick and easy, but still fantastic quality! It's small enough to throw in my diaper bag or back pocket, gotta love that! The flash is an awkward place and my finger always hits it, but that's the only complaint I have! I would recommend it to anyone, anyday!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I bought this camera for the times I don't feel like hauling all the heavy camera gear around. When I'm out and about with friends, I also been using it at work when I need to take a picture for a visual record. By the way my other camera's are D3's, the quality is pretty good for this little camera that fit's in my pocket.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I bought the Nikon S8000 thinking that Nikon always delivers good picture quality. I am an avid amateur photographer, and own several Nikon DSLRs which I think are outstanding. Unfortunately, with the S8000 my trust was misplaced. While the camera is sleek with excellent shooting performance, the quality of the images was simply terrible. Even in good outdoor lighting at ISO 100 there is smudging and loss of detail when zooming in to 100%. All the pictures look as if they're slightly out of focus, and this did not change despite adjusting autofocus settings, anti-vibration settings etc. The quality of indoor shots was even worse. I used this camera for 2 months, and tried every possible setting to fix the image quality. Video quality is excellent, but there is a nagging high pitch sound in ... all of the footage. If you care about image quality do not buy this camera. I'm selling mine at a loss. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: What a superb little camera. I wanted a small, lightweight, stylish camera and I got it with this one. It takes just as clear pictures as my daughters SLR to be honest!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Excellent little camera. Very easy to install data and operate. Good quality pictures and good wide angle. Only problem is you have to be careful not to put fingers over flash when in auto mode otherwise you can impede it coming up. Otherwise, great camera

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Zoom; Short Lag Time; Good Image Stabilization
This is the second camera I bought from Beach camera. The other was a Nikon P100. I normally use a Nikon D300 but we needed something that would fit in a pocket for casual use or when I don't want 7 lbs hanging around my neck. I was impressed with P100 and wanted something with similar features and the S8000 was that camera. I think I'll buy another one for my daughter. It has a smaller profile than I expected from the photos I saw on the web which was a pleasant surprise.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Bought the camera for my girlfreind for christmas and she absolutely loves it. i compared it to a few other cameras and it proofed to be better than most at this price range. Would advise anyone to buy one of these cameras its brill, easy to use and small enough to carry about with you. I was lucky enought to have purchased this at argos when they had a special price on but knowing what i know now i would certainly pay the normal retail price.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Picture clarity is great!
Cons: Position of flash!
I have several Nikon cameras because I take a lot of pictures of my twin boys and this is the best one of all! Great pictures, very clear even with fast motion. I like the features including the HD movies, continuous shots, high pix and the zoom gets you in there close. One thing though, whoever put that flash exactly where you hold the camera needs another job...who would do that....but despite that, I really like the camera...but that flash position is crazy!! I would recommend it because of the great pictures!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Great Camera for a bit expensive price.
Item.Review: Easy to use for all good picture quality memories of my travel visits. Compact size makes easy to carry and 14 mp makes good sense foe bigger blowups. Life of battery is a concern if u forget to take a charger. Needed a better performing batttery or manufacturer could provide a spare one free along with the camera.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I use it when I need a point a shoot instead of my slr. Works well and takes excellent quality photos. I like the way the camera fits in my hand, not too small and not too large.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to use... almost point and click
Cons: Haven't noticed it yet
So far I like my camera a lot. I just need to find things to take pictures of... LOL! Easy to use... practically point-and-click! ;)
My only real disappointment so far is that Best Buy DOES NOT sell the correct Nikon Digital Camera Bag for the Coolpix S8000.
BestBuy.com's list of recommended accessories shows this: Nikon Leather Case for Nikon Coolpix S-Series Digital Cameras - Black; Model: 11583 | SKU: 9449457
Well, I found this at the store and tried to place my camera inside. That bag is too small. You have to force the camera inside and the lid will not fold over and close completely.
I went to the NikonUSA.com website and found that the "COOLPIX S Series Horizontal Camer ... a Case - Leather, Product Number 11630" is what should be recommended. http://www.nikonusa.com/Find-Your-Nikon/Product/Camera-Cases/11630/COOLPIX-S-Series-Horizontal-Camera-Case---Leather.html
I'm disappointed that Best Buy does not carry this item; I wish they would because I'd certainly buy one. Heh! Maybe after reading this, they'll stock it! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: A very compact camera that fits in your pocket, with a REAL optical 10x zoom. There is very little shutter lag (you don't think about the issue while using the camera). It takes my new 16gb card. This means the card holds 3,500 pictures! At full 14MB resolution!!! It isn't an SLR, but it comfortably fits in a suit and has a comparable zoom

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use
Cons: Doesn't Have All The Features The Canon sx210is Has
I really like this camera, it's so easy to use. Auto Mode works great. Picture quality is very good and its 90 dollars cheaper than the canon sx210is which was my next choice. This camera works great for anyone who doesn't want to fuss around with manual mode. Plus it looks great and has an amazing screen.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good pictures - I like the 10x zoom - easy to use
Cons: Flash is in bad location - I have a habit of placing my left index finger where the flash is.
The camera takes good pictures. The macro is easy to use and takes really nice close-up shots. I think it's worth the investment.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: User Friendly, Great Zoom
Cons: Deleting multiple pictures at a time takes more than one step.
User Friendly - easy to asjust settings Great Zoom - given size of camera, it has a great zoom Deleting multiple pictures at a time takes more than one step.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: clarity of photos, ease of use, zoom & compact size
Cons: pop up flash
Camera thus far has taken clean, clear photos. You must get used to the settings and make sure you have the correct one on. The anti-blink feature actually makes my kids blind in all the photos so I turned that off. Major FLAW to me is the pop up flash - I just can't get used to not putting my fingers up over it to let it pop up and it interfere's with picture taking. It's going to take some getting used to. I'm definitely holding onto the camera. The zoom and compact size seem to be unbeatable.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Looks sexy, good price, great picture quality
Cons: Haven't found any cons yet
This camera was definantly worth the wait. I am very pleased that I chose this one over the p100. If you want something slim and portable that has great features and pretty good quality then this is for you!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: picture quality and color reproduction
Cons: pop up flash location....high pitch sound in ALL videos
I thought I would love this camera, and i really really want to. But, there are a couple things that are making me rethink my purchase. First, for three hundred bucks the camera seems to have everything I would want in a compact P&S. 14 Megapixels, Bright large LCD, Great Zoom, nice glass optics 720p HD video w/Stereo sound. However, this camera lacks almost all manual controls and the video is unwatchable due to a horrible high pitch sound on every video shot in any location. I am sure people will say, if you want a video camera buy a video camera....honestly, i refuse to carry 2 devices. My old exilim that stopped working recently took better video in the sense ... that i could listen to the sound. I doubt even a firmware update will fix this issue so this camera will go bakc to the store.
bottom line for me is, the camera takes beautiful stills but i have a very cute 20 month old son and we want to capture video and stills of him whenever we can. So, if you EVER plan to shoot some video do not buy this camera. Nikon should be ashamed by releasing this camera with an obvious flaw. expand » « collapse
